DataSource.query:
select distinct
*

from
(
select
distinct
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA') as vvs,
kd_nr,
substr(kbez,1,55)||' KD '||kd_nr||' VVS '||nvl(vvs,'NA') as alias,
'N' as Flag,
'Kunde' as uda
,to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from
dtl_br_vertrag
where to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_vertrag where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))


union all
select 
distinct
'A_'||nvl(vvs,'NA'),
KD_NR,
substr(kbez,1,55)||' KD '||kd_nr||' VVS '||vvs,
'N',
'Kunde'
,to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from dtl_br_kunden_man_rest
where to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_kunden_man_rest where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))

union all
select
distinct
'A_'||vvs,
kd_nr,
substr(kd_kbez,1,55)||' KD '||kd_nr||' VVS '||vvs,
'N',
'Kunde'
,to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')
from dtl_br_provisionen_rest
where to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY') between to_date('Jan_'||(select substr(monatsscheibe,5,2) from pv_parameter),'Mon_YY') and (select max(last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY'))) from dtl_br_provisionen_rest where last_day(to_date(monatsscheibe,'Mon_YY')) <= (select last_day(to_date('Dez_'||substr(monatsscheibe,5,2),'Mon_YY')) from pv_parameter))
        and kd_nr is not null
)

order by kd_nr,6 asc
